Enjoyed Cardiff: Living On The Streets tonight on @BBCWales. Much-needed exposé on the plight of our capital's #homeless. Upsetting stories.
Overall? A solid Rumble match. @BraunStrowman was beastly, @Goldberg made his point, #Undertaker got screwed...@RandyOrton 🔥👍🏻 #RoyalRumble

Beyond proud that Wales was represented by @MandrewsJunior at #WWEUKCT, who arguably had the match of the tourney vs @PeteDunneYxB 🔥🔥🔥
What a fantastic showing for UK wrestling that was this weekend! #WWEUKCT has ignited a fire of interest again. Hats off to all 16 men 🔥🔥🔥
I don't know Tommy End...there, I said it. #WWEUKCT
These competitors have raised the bar for British wrestling these past two nights. #WWEUKCT
That was a @WWE pay-per-view quality match!!! @MandrewsJunior and @PeteDunneYxB just tore the house down in @WGEmpress! #WWEUKCT
@MandrewsJunior and @PeteDunneYxB should BOTH advance to the final! Fantastic match. #WWEUKCT
@Tyler_Bate has his cards marked going forward for all the right reasons. I was sold last night. He's managed to remind me why tonight
Talk about a cat amongst the pigeons! Did not see @trentseven being beat at this stage! @WolfgangYoung showing some definite value! #WWEUKCT
These men are looking for that showstealer! #WWEUKCT
@trentseven and @WolfgangYoung = should be a dandy! #WWEUKCT
Sad to hear that #JimmySnuka has passed away. Set aside personal controversies, he's still a bonafide legend of #prowrestling. #innovator
@MandrewsJunior would make Ricky 'the Dragon' Steamboat smirk with those arm drags #WWEUKCT
Convincing win for @PeteDunneYxB in #WWEUKCT. @WWE seemingly has invested in this youngster. Rightly so. Top #heel
No One or Puppets...wow...#MetInShanghai https://t.co/wQIyV4DQyA

Walt just did the "I am the one who knocks" speech...epic
#BreakingBad
If that was what I can come to expect...roll on night 2 of the #WWEUKCT! 🇬🇧🇬🇧🇬🇧
What a match from both guys! @Tyler_Bate is bonafide money going forward. So much talent for a 19 year old. Great finish. #WWEUKCT
@Tyler_Bate is 19 yrs old. He is the proof that #prowrestling is alive + well in the UK! Expecting big things in this last 15 mins #WWEUKCT
How much fun was that from @DeeMoloney97 and Wales' own @MandrewsJunior? Crowd = won over! Great night of pure entertainment. #WWEUKCT
Damn you @WWE! You can still do it! Flinched thinking @MandrewsJunior #WWEUKCT journey was over!
@mjwwales Barri is probably in Tesco picking up his multiple tins of tuna like in the S4C show they did on him 😄
Backing @MandrewsJunior to become the first ever @WWE UK Champion. Wales' own after all! C'mon boy! #WWEUKCT
Brilliant first night! Reception is totally deserved. #WWEUKCT https://t.co/Pkx1TsOCOR
@WolfgangYoung has a new fan in Wales. Count me in to the party! Another breakout moment in #WWEUKCT. What an hour and 15 mins so far.
Worked shows for pureCATCH Wrestling in Wales with @Tyson_T_Bone. Surreal to see him hit the big leagues as part of #WWEUKCT
@PeteDunneYxB @RoyJohnsonYeah delivering a brilliant 15 minutes. Both men have done what they needed to do. Heads = turned. #WWEUKCT
You can't underestimate how much legitimacy that @McGuinnessNigel gives the whole concept by being on commentary. Authentic talent #WWEUKCT
These #WWEUKCT haven't seen a clothesline or lariat they don't like...big fans of the old finishes.
@RhysGrav Always next year mate...or when they do the inevitable weekly show
@RhysGrav I've heard of like 5/6 of them and worked shows with @Tyson_T_Bone. Great opportunity for them to state their intention tonight.
@sam_gradwell's hype video has sold me on him as a competitor. Announcers doing a great job on him too. Let's see the ring work now #WWEUKCT
@Jordan_Devlin1 and @TheGuvnorMStone putting on a nice show. Nasty gash on Burch's head. Fans are so into this event. Awesome. #WWEUKCT
